## RedropPolicy type

Defines how redrop of source endpoints can be done.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RedropPolicy = typeof REDROP_POLICY_STRICT | typeof REDROP_POLICY_ANY;
```
<b>References:</b> [REDROP\_POLICY\_STRICT](./core.redrop_policy_strict.md)<!-- -->, [REDROP\_POLICY\_ANY](./core.redrop_policy_any.md)
